articles.title: ‘India is lucky…’: HDFC chairman Deepak Parekh on RBI MPC’s latest interest rate decision - Times Now
articles.description: HDFC Chairman Deepak Parekh endorsed RBI's decision to pause the rising interest rate cycle amid global headwinds when the Western world faces issues due to a sudden policy reversal to contain inflation after witnessing years of quantitative easing.
